headline: Intuit (NasdaqGS:INTU) Unveils New Data-Driven Tools For SMB Growth At FWD Event
summary: Intuit (NasdaqGS:INTU) recently announced a suite of advanced marketing tools at Mailchimp FWD: London, designed to aid small- and mid-sized businesses in leveraging customer data for enhanced engagement. This product roll-out aligns with the company's ongoing enhancements to its offerings, contributing to its 31% share price increase last quarter. Such developments complemented the robust Q3 earnings report, which showcased increased revenue and earnings per share. Additionally, the...
